name: give
description: Give a user power. Requires `All Access` or `Point Permissions` role to run.

name: remove
description: Remove a user's power. Requires `All Access` or `Point Permissions` role to run.

name: botname
description: Change the bot's name. Only the owner of the bot and the developer can run this.

name: botavatar
description: Change the bot's avatar using an image link. Only the owner of the bot and the developer can run this.
